Sergeant Alenos:
The Seed of Destruction can be called a huge fortress. To break into it, it is necessary to destroy many different obstacles on the way. Of course the neighborhood is guarded by a lot of dragon soldiers.
Either way, we have nothing left but to move forward, destroying all barriers. If everything works out, we will reach the Thiad throne. And then we can fight it.
However, you can not hesitate. If we do not act quickly, the dragon will again take over the fortress. Therefore, we need to develop the invasion plan as quickly as possible
